skills.name: HTML and CSS
skills.text: I have a strong foundation in HTML and CSS, ensuring that the websites I build are visually appealing and well-structured.

skills.name: JavaScript
skills.text: I am proficient in JavaScript, allowing me to add interactivity and functionality to websites.

skills.name: Responsive Design
skills.text: I specialize in creating responsive designs that adapt to different screen sizes and devices.

skills.name: TypeScript
skills.text: I have  experience in TypeScript development, leveraging its strong typing system to build robust and scalable applications.

skills.name: React
skills.text: As a skilled React developer, I can create interactive user interfaces and build reusable components to enhance the user experience.

skills.name: NextJS
skills.text: With NextJS, I can develop server-side rendered React applications, providing fast and optimized performance.
